name: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - Karen and Hikari (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Hikari x Karen doujin.

name: Kimi to Parade
nutshell: Kikuchi woke up one fine morning to a message from his ex-girlfriend telling him that she was seeing someone else. Having to go to work after such a crappy experience, he was faced with his university friend Sera's boyfriend, Akaboshi, who also happened to be his adorable student. Usually Akaboshi is rather stoic and aloof, but in front of Sera, he just brimmed with so much happiness. Sadly, Sera harboured a secret that will threaten their relationship and poor Kikuchi, being Sera's good friend, knew about it. As a result, he is caught in between. It didn't help that Kikuchi's falling for his student too…

name: Don't Mind the Sex of Others
nutshell:
A girl who works on a coffee shop encounters her ex-girl friend, and the rumor of she being a lesbian spreads. Then, she meets with an homophobic person.
Author's Twitter

name: Mayoi Neko Overrun!
nutshell: The story revolves around Takumi Tsuzuki, a boy who lives with his older "sister" Otome, although the two have no blood ties between them. Otome manages a run-down confectionery store called Stray Cats. One day, Otome picks up a mysterious beautiful girl off the streets.

name: By Hero
nutshell:
From Intercross:
Sendrick is a little bird that has always hated humans the most in the world. All his life, he's been running from them out of fear, but soon, he accidentally encounters a human tomboy-ish girl named Kayana. This unexpected encounter might actually change a lot in Sendrick's mind.

name: Diamond no Ace - K no Shiretsu M no Doukou (Doujinshi)
nutshell: When there is talk of a ghost at the Seidou dormitory, Nabe comes up with a solution that Kuramochi and Miyuki must implement to get rid of the ghost.

name: Hataraku Saibou HIV Special Edition
nutshell: This manga introduces the main mechanism of the HIV infection and its effect on the body.

name: Atarashii Kazoku ga Dekimashita.
nutshell:
The main character, Ao, loses her father and is taken in by her uncle's family. Haruki, her uncle, appears in front of her as she is about to start her new life. But I didn't expect to see him dressed as a woman! And his occupation is that of a bar "mom"!?
What will be the course of Ao's new life, that began with a series of surprises…?
(Source: MU)

name: An Andro Doro
nutshell:
MC has a government-funded sex doll whose sole purpose is to drain his semen.
Yes.

name: Akarui Kazoku Keikaku
nutshell: A cute story about Honoka and the guys she has to live with (a pair of twins in kindergarten, a junior high student, a high school student, a college student) as well as the other guys she meets in school. Honoka is generally a sweet, naive girl which draws an assortment of guys who instinctively want to protect her and maybe become her boyfriend…

name: Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon Materials Collection
nutshell:
The Materials Collection (美少女戦士セーラームーン設定資料集) is a photo-book with all of Takeuchi Naoko’s preliminary and prototype designs of the characters specifically for animation. It includes illustrations of each character, minus monsters-of-the-day and other one-shot appearances for all five seasons of the series.
This collection is especially useful for Sailor Moon cosplayers who are looking to create the most accurate representation of a specific character’s outfit possible. Some of the prototype characters never made it into the final cut for the anime (like Diana the Moon Fairy), so this is also an interesting read for serious fans of the show.
(Source: Miss Dream)

name: Gojuu, Rokujuu, Yorokonde
nutshell: The story centers on the pure romance between a 60 year old handsome man and a 50 year old recently divorced woman.

name: Hozuki-san Chi no Aneki
nutshell: Gorou has a crush on his older step sister Haru. Unfortunately for Gorou, Haru happens to love teasing him sadistically in every way possible.This is a 4-koma crack comedy about their wacky day to day life and interactions.

name: Kuroko no Basuke  - Tenshi no OO (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Kagami x Kuroko

name: Gu-Gu Ganmo
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
He is a chicken, but not a chicken, and although he understands human language, he is not a human. Ganmo is a chicken-like housemate who has fallen in love with an ordinary family.
He is currently struggling to become a good pet for his owners, Hanpeita-kun, a mischievous third grader in elementary school, and Tsukune-chan, a carefree junior high school student! How will Ganmo do?

name: Sumire Sensei Doesn't Want to Cook
Thank You for Being a Part of My Youth
tags: Oneshot,Long Strip,Romance,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: A short dedicated to unrequited love in youth.

name: The Devil’s Temptation
nutshell: Hyun was supposed to spend his Christmas snuggling with his cat on his comfy couch watching TV. This year, however, he decides to attend his company holiday party to make his existence known to his office crush — the devilishly handsome Alek — but instead, downs too many drinks, makes a fool of himself, and blacks out. The morning after, he wakes up to a Christmas nightmare: lying next to him butt naked is his despicable colleague, Ivan Mariani. Hyun has always hated everything about Ivan. So why does Ivan suddenly look different…smell wonderful…and radiate irresistible sexual energy?

name: Kosodate Host wa Koi wo Tonaeru
nutshell: No. 1 host Chiharu is raising his dead sister's child. He's got no idea what he's doing, and everyday is a struggle. When one day, bad luck strikes him hard. he breaks his arm and because of a roof leak, his home is a mess. He's at a complete loss, when the Head Priest of the nearby temple comes to his aid, offering to let him live at the temple for the time being. However, he's astonished when he's introduced to the Head Priest's son. Standing in front of him was the only man who'd ever stolen the No.1 position from Chiharu - a former junior host: Fujinami! Even though he's younger, Fujinami is very composed and should be the kind of guy that Chiharu hates. But the big hands that touch Chiharu so gently, as if to spoil him, are so pleasant. And Chiharu's tense mind and body unravel....?

name: Zettai Kunshu Shoukougun
nutshell: Kiriko and Takuto are both cousins. Often, they spend a lot of times with each other. What the people around them don't know (including their parents) is what transpire behind closed doors when the two of them are alone and in the same room…

name: Spring Breeze of Sunegurachika
nutshell:
Set in the Soviet Union, the mysterious girl named Berka and the quiet boy Shchenok help a Socialist Party member to escape from the secret police. Their aim is to infiltrate into a certain mansion that holds what they seek, but the secret police immediately capture the two. Will they be able to find what they seek and endure the torture of the secret police?


Won the 18th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2014

name: Gintama ~Whatever You're Doing, Starting Off on the Right Foot is Essential So It's Better to Overreach a Bit~ Anime Comic
nutshell: Comic version of the Jump Festa Anime Tour episode (the first animated material for Gintama).

name: Mr. Inagawa's Ghost Story Treasure Box
nutshell: A collaboration between horror radio show host personality Inagawa Junji and horror mangaka Itou Junji. Published in the September 2007 issue of "Real Horror Stories.

name: Yasashii Hari
nutshell:
Ryoutarou is a boy who likes to knit. He has a younger stepsister that he spoils and cares about a lot. He thought that his life will always continue to be as peaceful and quiet until one day, he encountered a beautiful lady standing still in the rain without even an umbrella over her. Since then, his heart can't seem to settle down.
Thus our knitting boy has fallen, right into his first love.

name: Dive
nutshell: Due to an incident years ago, Youngwan became a swimmer who has a phobia of water. After giving up swimming to live a normal college life, he met Sunwoo, an honor student majoring in piano who made an absurd request...

name: Yorokobi wa Hiza no Ue
nutshell: Orito Kouki was working in his mother’s pub and saw an unexpected customer, Mitsuru. Mitsuru was the elder brother of his college friend, Yuzuru. Mitsuru looked totally different from Orito’s impression of him. Mitsuru suddenly kissed Orito and asked Orito to keep his visit to the pub a secret from Yuzuru. It turned out that their feelings for each other was mutual. But because the brothers were really close, so out of jealousy, Orito told Yuzuru about it. Would the brothers forgive Orito?

name: Kou Kiiro Kyanbasu
nutshell:
天才女画家东云波正在进行以“情色”为主题的创作。
然而，波实在毫无头绪。
于是，青梅竹马南尘一郎决定协助波……
エロスを題材にすることになった天才女流画家の波。
男のカラダを知るため風俗に行こうとした波に幼馴染がした提案は…!?
「今から好きになれ、俺のこと」

name: The Crossdressing Boy Who Lets Me Choose
Infinite Stratos - so, soukurutoha KIITE naizoo... (Doujinshi)
He Is a Beast
tags: Long Strip,Romance,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: A cat? A dog? No, it's obviously a beast! In a small town where a bloodshed occurred, Chana, a typical female high school student met Yumu, a popular male high school student, who was suspected of being a murderer. As the relationship between the two changed as time passed, the man who seemed to be gentle and kind in front of her gradually showed his true self, and the truth of all the incidents also surfaced.

name: Guai Qi Bi Ji
nutshell:
Reader mode: Long strip
Read left to right
This is the concentration camp of strange imaginations, and also wonderful manhua stories! Until the last second, the ending is always beyond your imagination.

name: The School's Urban Legends
tags: Action,Ghosts,Long Strip,Comedy,School Life,Horror,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Supernatural,Full Color
nutshell: We’ll give your standard urban legend with a comedic twist! A touch of science will turn a seemingly scary ghost story into a comedy! There is a ghost that plays piano by dropping her blood onto the keys!? Wait… Just how dense does the blood droplet have to be in order to actually press a piano key? Waaait… How much blood loss would the ghost suffer if she were to play piano all night? Won’t she be dried up like jerky by morning?
